name: Jaysamin :)
greetingText: Woah its already Valentine's, How was you day my Baby?
wishText:
Hihi Happy valentines my babyy I hope you have a great day
and I wish you all the best in the world. Good luck on your
quizes today, I hope you do well and please take care of yourself mwamwa,
I'll see u later in the evening hihi. I hope you will like this 
and I love you so much!!!
